channel.title: CVE Feed for wireapp -- wire-avs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wireapp -- wire-avs

item.title: CVE-2021-41193|2024-08-04T03:08:31.656Z -- wireapp -- wire-avs
item.description: wire-avs is the audio visual signaling (AVS) component of Wire, an open-source messenger. A remote format string vulnerability in versions prior to 7.1.12 allows an attacker to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code. The issue has been fixed in wire-avs 7.1.12. There are currently no known workarounds.
